description:
"I finished school a few weeks ago," Todd told us when he first came out for a visit.
He'd been studying photography and video production and was just starting his job search.
"I'd like to start out as a video engineer or production assistant for a television show," he said. "Something to just get my foot in the door."
He's straight and has a girlfriend, and says that they like to do "freaky" stuff every now and then.
Todds got a cute smile and a lean, muscular build. But most of all, I love this guy's dick. It's uncut and perfectly shaped, with beautiful, low-hanging nuts!
title: Todd
